title: Which word is an antonym for difficult?
Which of the following is a compound sentence?
answer_1: Because I like coffee, I drink it every day.
answer_2: Although I like coffee, I drink tea.
answer_3: I like coffee, and she likes tea.
right_answer: I like coffee, and she likes tea.
